root.name: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Fallen
root.description: GameplayThe game is played from a third person perspective with the player cast as Captain Benjamin Sisko, Lieutenant-Commander Worf and Major Kira Nerys over the course of the game to play out the parts of an overarching story. Features voice work from Deep Space Nine's cast. The game utilises the Unreal engine and had excellent graphics for its time, particularly notable were the particle and lighting effects on the phaser weapons.
